entries: Each creature of the <name>'s choice within 5 feet gains an +1 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The <name> must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

Each creature of the <name>'s choice within 5 feet gains an +2 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The <name> must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.
{@atkr mw, rw} <hit_default>, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. <dmg_medium> piercing damage.
{@atkr mw} <hit_default>, reach 5 ft. <dmg_puny> bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition Prone}.

When a creature the <name> can see enters its reach or makes an attack against a creature other than the <name> while within its reach, the <name> can make a special Opportunity Attack with its Spear.
